  • Method Details

    • createServiceCustomization

      public CustomizationsApi.CreateServiceCustomizationAdapter createServiceCustomization(com.here.platform.data.client.base.ols.generated.scaladsl.model.routing.RoutingCustomizationPostRequest routingCustomizationPostRequest, Optional<String> xRequestID)
      Creates a Routing customization resource. The created customization is allocated a unique HRN which can be passed to one of the compatible routing services to enable customized routing functionality.

      Path: /customizations

      Method: POST

      Expected answers:

      code 201 : RoutingCustomizationResponse (Successfully created requested customization. Response body contains configuration of the newly created customization. This response code indicates that customization resource has been created and underlying infrastructure is prepared in-line with input configurations. The runtime status of the system can be inspected from RoutingCustomization object's currentState or activeConfig fields.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 400 : ErrorResponse (Response when a particular request parameter is considered invalid or could not be parsed correctly.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : AuthErrorResponse (API response in case of unauthorized access.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 403 : AuthErrorResponse (API response in case of forbidden access.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 0 : ErrorResponse (API response in case of errors.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      routingCustomizationPostRequest - Customization configuration that contains information on the Routing customization to be created.
      xRequestID - User-provided token that can be used to trace a request or a group of requests sent to the service.

    • deleteRoutingCustomization

      public CustomizationsApi.DeleteRoutingCustomizationAdapter deleteRoutingCustomization(String customizationHrn, Optional<String> xRequestID)
      Deletes the Routing customization associated with the specified HRN.

      Path: /customizations/{customizationHrn}

      Method: DELETE

      Expected answers:

      code 204 : (Successful operation) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 400 : ErrorResponse (Response when a particular request parameter is considered invalid or could not be parsed correctly.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : AuthErrorResponse (API response in case of unauthorized access.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 403 : AuthErrorResponse (API response in case of forbidden access.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 0 : ErrorResponse (API response in case of errors.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      customizationHrn - HRN identifier of the Routing customization.
      xRequestID - User-provided token that can be used to trace a request or a group of requests sent to the service.

    • getServiceCustomization

      public CustomizationsApi.GetServiceCustomizationAdapter getServiceCustomization(String customizationHrn, Optional<String> xRequestID)
      Retrieves the customization associated with the specified HRN.

      Path: /customizations/{customizationHrn}

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : RoutingCustomizationResponse (A successful response contains the details of the Routing customization found.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 400 : ErrorResponse (Response when a particular request parameter is considered invalid or could not be parsed correctly.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : AuthErrorResponse (API response in case of unauthorized access.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 403 : AuthErrorResponse (API response in case of forbidden access.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 0 : ErrorResponse (API response in case of errors.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      customizationHrn - HRN identifier of the Routing customization.
      xRequestID - User-provided token that can be used to trace a request or a group of requests sent to the service.

    • getServiceCustomizationTypes

      public CustomizationsApi.GetServiceCustomizationTypesAdapter getServiceCustomizationTypes(Optional<String> xRequestID)
      Returns the types of customizations, as well as their corresponding metadata, that are supported by the Routing services.

      Path: /customizationTypes

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : CustomizationTypes (A successful response contains the customization types and their metadata. Includes one entry for each customization type supported by the Routing services.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 400 : ErrorResponse (Response when a particular request parameter is considered invalid or could not be parsed correctly.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : AuthErrorResponse (API response in case of unauthorized access.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 403 : AuthErrorResponse (API response in case of forbidden access.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 0 : ErrorResponse (API response in case of errors.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      xRequestID - User-provided token that can be used to trace a request or a group of requests sent to the service.

    • getServiceCustomizations

      public CustomizationsApi.GetServiceCustomizationsAdapter getServiceCustomizations(Optional<String> xRequestID, Optional<String> typeIds, Optional<String> q, Optional<Boolean> linkable, Optional<String> pageToken, Optional<Integer> limit)
      Returns the Routing customizations that the request's token has access to.

      Path: /customizations

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : RoutingCustomizationPage (A successful response containing the HRNs and details of the Routing customizations corresponding to request.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 400 : ErrorResponse (Response when a particular request parameter is considered invalid or could not be parsed correctly.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : AuthErrorResponse (API response in case of unauthorized access.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 403 : AuthErrorResponse (API response in case of forbidden access.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 0 : ErrorResponse (API response in case of errors.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      xRequestID - User-provided token that can be used to trace a request or a group of requests sent to the service.
      typeIds - Optional identifier to filter for a specific customization type. Comma delimited if you wish to specify multiple customization types.
      q - A query string used to match or filter a collection of customization resources based on a substring match against the hrn, name, and description fields.
      linkable - Indicates if the response should only return the list of linkable customization resources.

      If set to 'true' and the access token has a project scope, then the response will include the customizations that are available to the caller to link to the project in the token's project scope (as well as HERE public customizations).
      pageToken - If specified, the specific page based on the token is returned. Not recommended to use directly, will be provided as part of next uri when pagination is necessary.
      limit - Number of results to return per page.

    • getServiceCustomizations

      public CustomizationsApi.GetServiceCustomizationsBuilder getServiceCustomizations()

    • updateServiceCustomization

      public CustomizationsApi.UpdateServiceCustomizationAdapter updateServiceCustomization(String customizationHrn, com.here.platform.data.client.base.ols.generated.scaladsl.model.routing.RoutingCustomizationPutRequest routingCustomizationPutRequest, Optional<String> xRequestID)
      Updates the Routing customization associated with the specified HRN.

      Path: /customizations/{customizationHrn}

      Method: PUT

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : RoutingCustomizationResponse (Successfully updated customization. Response body contains configuration of the updated customization.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 400 : ErrorResponse (Response when a particular request parameter is considered invalid or could not be parsed correctly.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : AuthErrorResponse (API response in case of unauthorized access.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 403 : AuthErrorResponse (API response in case of forbidden access.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 0 : ErrorResponse (API response in case of errors.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      customizationHrn - HRN identifier of the Routing customization.
      routingCustomizationPutRequest - A Routing customization configuration that contains information about the customization to be updated.
      xRequestID - User-provided token that can be used to trace a request or a group of requests sent to the service.

      public CustomizationsApi.UpdateServiceCustomizationBuilder updateServiceCustomization()
